Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the image purportedly showing Rihanna holding the flag of Pakistan. It falsely portrays her as having a Pakistani link when in reality she was holding a flag with the Cricket West Indies crest.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Rihanna was holding a flag with the Cricket West Indies crest, not the flag of Pakistan.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Rihanna was holding the flag of Pakistan.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image of Rihanna holding the flag of Pakistan is genuine, when in fact it has been morphed.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the image of Rihanna holding the flag of Pakistan was manipulated to falsely portray her as having a Pakistani link.
